snippet: The governors of Oklahoma and South Carolina signed bills within the past week repealing the Common Core state standards, guidelines for children’s achievement in reading and math between kindergarten and high school graduation.
abstract: Governors of Oklahoma and South Carolina sign bills repealing the Common Core state standards, guidelines for children’s achievement in reading and math between kindergarten and high school graduation.
